result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bobby Joe Grady

records.addlTxt: Justice Point Pretrial Services Status Report, filed.

Defendant Bobby Joe Grady in court.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Bobby Joe Grady.  Prosecuting attorney Arthur Kenneth Thexton in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in Court for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defense requested adjournment of proceedings. Court grants request.  Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 16, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Order to Produce, forwarded for signature.
Court amends cash bail to $500.00.  Court order no contact with victim or locations, at least once a week check-ins with attorney, and make all court appearances.

Defendant Bobby Joe Grady not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren Aty in court for Bobby Joe Grady.  Prosecuting attorney Thomas Hasle in court for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Defense's Bail Hearing held.  Arguments heard.  For reasons stated on the record, Court amends cash bail to $500.00.  Court order no contact with victim or locations, at least once a week check-ins with attorney, and make all court appearances.  Case remains calendared for Plea and Sentencing on 10/13/2022 at 2:00 pm, Courthouse Room 508.
CORRECTION: Judge Konkol presided over Branch 13 on August 31st, 2022

Based on Attorney Mogren's appearance in Court and Defendant's Notice of Motion for Modification of Bail Conditions efiled with the Court on 9/8/2022, Court scheduled off the record a Bail/Bond Hearing for 9/21/2022 at 8:30 a.m. in Room 508 of the Courthouse. Parties notified.
for Modification of Bail Conditions, Defense, filed.

Defendant Bobby Joe Grady not in court, in custody.  Attorney Joel Alan Mogren in court for Bobby Joe Grady.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a pre-trial conference. Defense does not have discovery or offer. Defense requests a plea and sentencing date.
Case adjourned.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Court ordered no contact with Kohls Department Store 5650 North Bayshore Drive, Glendale
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.

Defendant Bobby Joe Grady in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Bobby Joe Grady in custody.  Michael J. Odden appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Triggiano, Branch 13.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant pled not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Case is adjourned to Branch 13.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
